metadata.title: CVE-2024-38439 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Netatalk 3.2.0 has an off-by-one error and resultant heap-based bufferoverflow because of setting ibuf[PASSWDLEN] to '\0' in FPLoginExt in loginin etc/uams/uams_pam.c.

criterions.comment: netatalk package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
